answerText: Nernst equation[10] The formation of this gas has a standard reduction potential of zero.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 5 | 4 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: An equation named for Goldman, Hodgkin, and Katz reduces to this one when the permeability is set to one and only one ion is considered. [10] Name this equation named for a German chemist, which gives the reduction potential for an electrochemical reaction given the number of electrons transferred and the concentration of the reactants.
